titles.title: A bill to amend subtitle IV of title 40, United States Code, regarding county additions to the Appalachian region.
A bill to amend subtitle IV of title 40, United States Code, regarding county additions to the Appalachian region.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary: Adds the Tennessee counties of Hickman, Perry, and Wayne to the definition of "Appalachian region" for purposes of Appalachian regional development efforts.
